the_missing_heir.name: The Missing Heir
the_missing_heir.description: The royal heir vanished 20 years ago. What happened?

clues.name: Torn Royal Banner
clues.description: A piece of royal fabric, stained with blood

clues.name: Mysterious Locket
clues.description: Contains a portrait of the missing heir
clues.unlocks: NPC dialogue with Lady Ashford's ghost

clues.name: Ransom Note
clues.description: Demands that were never met

clues.name: Witness Account
clues.description: Saw a hooded figure take the child

clues.name: Hidden Chamber
clues.description: Secret room with signs of struggle

solution.truth: The heir was kidnapped by the Shadow Syndicate but rescued by a mysterious figure. The heir now lives in hiding as an adventurer, unaware of their true identity.

singing_stones.name: The Singing Stones Mystery
singing_stones.description: Ancient stones that hum during celestial events. What is their purpose?

clues.name: First Stone
clues.description: A stone that hums with power during full moons

clues.name: Second Stone
clues.description: This stone resonates with the first

clues.name: Third Stone
clues.description: The final stone in the triangle

clues.name: Ancient Star Map
clues.description: Shows constellation alignment with stone locations

clues.name: Celestial Alignment
clues.description: The stones must be activated simultaneously

solution.truth: The singing stones are an ancient communication device left by the Celestial Heroes. When activated, they reveal the location of a hidden celestial sanctuary.

sixth_celestial.name: The Sixth Celestial
sixth_celestial.description: Legends speak of five Celestial Heroes, but ancient texts hint at a sixth

clues.name: Defaced Monument
clues.description: A statue with one figure chiseled away

clues.name: Forbidden Text
clues.description: Mentions 'the Betrayer' who joined the darkness

clues.name: Shadow Whispers
clues.description: The darkness speaks of 'the one who fell'

clues.name: Ancient Weapon
clues.description: A legendary weapon with an unknown owner

clues.name: Ghost of the Sixth
clues.location: Appears during blood moon at Obsidian Citadel
clues.description: The spirit of the sixth celestial appears

solution.truth: The sixth Celestial was erased from history after betraying the others. They didn't join the darkness willingly - they were corrupted by the Ancient Evil while trying to destroy it alone. Their sacrifice actually strengthened the seal, but the others erased their memory out of shame.

cursed_village.name: The Cursed Village
cursed_village.description: An entire village disappeared overnight 100 years ago

clues.name: Abandoned Buildings
clues.description: Empty homes with meals still on tables

clues.name: Journal Entry
clues.description: Final entry speaks of 'the fog that takes'

clues.name: Strange Ritual Site
clues.description: Evidence of forbidden magic

clues.name: Survivor
clues.description: An ageless person who escaped the curse

solution.truth: The village attempted a ritual to gain immortality but instead trapped themselves in a time loop. They repeat the same day forever in a parallel dimension.

phantom_ship.name: The Phantom Ship
phantom_ship.description: A ghostly ship appears on foggy nights

clues.name: Ship Sightings
clues.description: All describe the same spectral vessel

clues.name: Shipwreck Map
clues.description: Shows where ships have sunk over centuries

clues.name: Captain's Log
clues.description: Final entry: 'The storm takes us. Treasure hidden on the isle.'

clues.name: Cursed Treasure
clues.description: Treasure protected by the crew's curse

solution.revealed_by: Return treasure to the ship during fog
solution.truth: The crew was cursed for stealing sacred treasure. Returning it lifts the curse.

world_tree_secret.name: The World Tree's Secret
world_tree_secret.description: The World Tree harbors an ancient secret

clues.name: Druid Prophecy
clues.description: Speaks of 'the heart within the tree'

clues.name: Tree Rings Pattern
clues.description: The rings form a map

clues.name: Underground Chamber
clues.description: Entrance hidden by nature magic

clues.name: Ancient Guardian
clues.description: A nature spirit protects something

solution.truth: The World Tree grows from the heart of a sleeping primordial god. If awakened, it could reshape the world.
solution.danger: Can lead to good or catastrophic ending

rewards.title: Keeper of Secrets
rewards.choice: Awaken the god or let them sleep

lore_knowledge.increases_with: Reading books and talking to scholars
